attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Free ronnie biggs from prison imediately,he is now hospitalised and no danger to the person on the street.In my opinion he has never been a danger , when you think this government has freed on bail numerous people who recomitted crime ,eg rape , murder , and crimes against children.FREE RONNIE BIGGS NOW.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
